tutorial.speak:
Every church in b1 has a website available at subdomain.b1.church.
See the Configuring Domains tutorial to the right for how to configure your subdomain.
You can use this as your primary website or have it be a suppliment to your existing site with B1 features.
Click on the icon of one of the pre-built templates or click the Plus sign in the top right corner to begin designing your page.
We have several pre-built pages as starting points to choose from.
Let's choose the location page. Give your page a title.
Click Save and a new location page will be created with suggested content you can edit.
If you wish to rename your page, click the Page Settings button in the top right.
In addition to the name, you can change the template or adjust the url. There is also a duplicate link if you want to create a second page with this content as the starting point.
To edit the actual content of the page, click the Edit Content button.
Here you can double-click any element to edit it, and add and remove elements. See the tutorial on Sections and Elements to learn how.
Click "Done" to go back.
Continue to add more pages using the plus icon. If you prefer, you can start from a blank page instead of a template.
You can add your page to the main navigation by clicking the plus icon next to main navigation.
Add the link settings and click save.
The navigation order will be updated.
To re-arrange the order of your navigation bar, simply drag and drop the page names in the Main Navigation section.
The navigation bar is now updated
